prs.title: Remove '.' from failing tests pattern
prs.truncated_body:
## Description

When I was debugging the failure that I was trying to fix in https://github.com/smartcontractkit/external-adapters-js/pull/3804, I noticed that
```
yarn workspaces list -R --json
```
also includes
```
{"location":".","name":"@chainlink/external-adapters-js"}
```
So I thought maybe the problem was that it was trying to compile `./tsconfig.test.json`.
This turned out not t

commits.message: Remove '.' from failing tests pattern

prs.title: Add missing tsconfig.test.json
prs.truncated_body:
## Description

https://github.com/smartcontractkit/external-adapters-js/pull/3785 added a check to compile `tsconfig.test.json` for every changed package.
But when https://github.com/smartcontractkit/external-adapters-js/pull/3801 tried to update the `typescript` dependency, that [check failed](https://github.com/smartcontractkit/external-adapters-js/actions/runs/14407558850/job/40407830282?pr

commits.message: Add missing tsconfig.test.json
Exclude .
debug
when there is nothing to compile
Remove set -x

dependabot(gomod): bump github.com/hashicorp/raft from 1.7.2 to 1.7.3

Bumps [github.com/hashicorp/raft](https://github.com/hashicorp/raft) from 1.7.2 to 1.7.3.
- [Release notes](https://github.com/hashicorp/raft/releases)
- [Changelog](https://github.com/hashicorp/raft/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md)
- [Commits](https://github.com/hashicorp/raft/compare/v1.7.2...v1.7.3)

---
updated-dependencies:
- dependency-name: github.com/hashicorp/raft
  dependency-version: 1.7.3
  dependency-type: direct:production
  update-type: version-update:semver-patch
...

Signed-off-by: dependabot[bot] <support@github.com>

prs.title: ci: Add missing github ro token context to jobs that don't have a token already
prs.truncated_body:
**Description**

Add the read-only GitHub token to jobs that don't have a GitHub token though other contexts (gcr-release most notably).

Fixes the op-program prestate publishing.

commits.message: ci: Add missing github ro token context to jobs that don't have a token already.

prs.title: challenger: Reduce level of overly chatty log message
prs.truncated_body: Logging every request for a claim creates a lot of noise and is really just tracing the execution of challenger.

commits.message:
challenger: Reduce level of overly chatty log message

Logging every request for a claim creates a lot of noise and is really just tracing the execution of challenger.
bank: strictly enforce cu invariant

commits.message: runtime: Bump Oasis SDK to 0.13.3 and prepare 0.10.2-testnet

prs.title: Feat/signer state conflict resolution strategies
prs.truncated_body:
When >= 70% of signers have allowed a reorg, remaining non-reorging signers will capitulate their viewpoint. 
When >= 30% of signers have rejected a reorg, remaining reorging signers will capitulate their viewpoint.

Closes https://github.com/stacks-network/stacks-core/issues/5917

prs.title: Add new RPC endpoint for The Ting Blockchain Testnet
prs.truncated_body:
This PR adds a new public RPC endpoint for The Ting Blockchain Testnet:
https://public.0xrpc.com/6666689

Ensures redundancy and better availability for developers.

The existing RPC (https://testnet.tingchain.org) remains unchanged.

Verified that the new RPC is functional and responsive.

Please review and merge. 🚀

prs.title: refactor: sdk use compressed account info from light-compressed-account
prs.truncated_body:
Changes:
1. rename `from_meta_mut` -> `meta_mut`
2. rename `CAccountInfo` -> `CompressedAccountInfo`
3. remove `light-sdk` implementations and import from `light-compressed-account` instead 
    3.1. `SystemInfoInstructionData`
    3.2. `InAccountInfo`
    3.3. `OutAccountInfo`
4. create `AccountInfoTrait` in `light-sdk` so that I don't need to implement sdk methods in `light-compressed-acc

commits.message: refactor: sdk use compressed account info from light-compressed-account
chore: resolve merge conflict

prs.title: refactor: unify Discriminator traits
prs.truncated_body:
**changes:**
1. refactor discriminator sdk macro to implement `Discriminator` instead of `light_hasher::Discriminator`
2. light-hasher remove Discriminator
3. light-account-checks remove constant from Discriminator
    3.1. adapt batched Merkle tree impl of Discriminator trait

commits.message: refactor: discriminator sdk macro, light-hasher remove Discriminator, light-account-checks remove constant from Discriminator

prs.title: refactor: light hasher, add fuzzing
prs.truncated_body:
Changes:
1. HashToFieldSize
    - blanket impl of hash_to_field_size with BorshSerialize
    (Changes behavior for Strings from as_bytes to vec<u8>)
2. ToByteArray
    - remove `to_byte_arrays` from trait
3. LightHasher
    3.1. remove flatten attribute from macro declaration (keep it internally but it cannot be specified in macro)
    3.2. refactor LightHasher impl into hasher dir
    3.
